QuestData.Title: Learn to Ride in the Eversong Woods
QuestData.Description: This pamphlet advertising riding training and mount purchases was sent from Perascamin.$B$BPerascamin can be found at Thuron's Livery, southeast of the Shepherd's Gate leaving Silvermoon City.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the pamphlet to Perascamin at Thuron's Livery in Silvermoon City.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ah, you received my letter? Good.
QuestData.RewardText: So, shall we begin your Apprentice Riding training?
